title: How to Get the Lazy Shell in Super Mario RPG

steps.headline: Get the seed and fertilizer.Read the additional sections to find out how.
Go to rose town and give the guy the seed and fertilizer.To get to the guy's house go north in rose town and you will see the house on the left.
Go up the tall vine.When you get up there, you will see two treasure chests floating one will contain the lazy shell the weapon, the other will contain the lazy shell dress.

text: Get the seed and fertilizer.Read the additional sections to find out how.  Go to rose town and give the guy the seed and fertilizer.To get to the guy's house go north in rose town and you will see the house on the left.  Go up the tall vine.When you get up there, you will see two treasure chests floating one will contain the lazy shell the weapon, the other will contain the lazy shell dress.
